to appeal, beg, beseech. {zhu ba, zhus pa, zhu ba, zhus} trans. v.; ft. of {zhu ba}; intr. pf. of {zhu ba}; intr. pf. of {'ju ba}; *; request [humbly]. bla mar zhu ba - to consult the lama. to recount
&#3925;&#3956;&#3939;: verb: offer; present; to give (hon.)noun: offering; present

[1720] 1.'bul ba'i skul tshig 2 ... .1) sngar bod lugs bre gang gi drug cha gcig  ... bre gang la phul drug yod/ ... 2) lag pa'i sor mo cung zad bskums pa'i khyor ba/ ... sa bon phul gang/ ... 3) mtha' dang khyad par ram/ mchog gam rab/ ... tsan dan dkar po ni tsan dan kun gyi phul/ ... 4) skar ma chu smad/ ...
Thumi (p.160) has 'buld for the imperative (skul tshig)  {T}
the smallest measure of grain (= 1/6 bre?).  Sources.  measure equivalent to 1/4 bre or 1/80th khal (a khal, 'load' is 25-30 lbs).
offer, present, handful, best, issued, a constellation, SA chu smad skar ma, 'bul ba, 1 of 28 constellations, SA rgyu skar, past of 'bul, to perform

1) ['bul ba!]; 2) 1/6 bre; 3) handful [fingers slightly bent :sa bon phul gang]; 4) the best, especially good; 4) star chu smad). 1) [p ! 'bul ba!] offered; 2) 1/6 bre, 1/4 [Gold]; 3) handful; 4) the best, especially good; 4) star chu smad
give; imp. of {'bul ba}; highest degree, perfection; a handful. kun gyi phul - the most sublime of all. {bcom ldan 'das la phul zhing} presented these to the Buddha
